title: Inventory Management and Tracking
description: Track inventory levels, chain of custody, and monitor trends throughout the year with up to the minute analytics.

title: GPS and Location Information
description: Connect your forms to stake points, plots, and rows. iFormBuilder will automatically capture your location and update the form to your specific location.

title: Plot Management
description: Integrate your iFormBuilder field notes with your existing databases, hardware, and plot management tools to bring field-level insights to your growing strategy.

title: Photo Capture
description: Capture and annotate photos in the field. Photos are stored directly in your forms and made available back in the office in real time.

title: Ultra Disconnected
description: No connection? No problem. Collect data anywhere, anytime. From remote plots to work in the office, iFormBuilder data is securely collected and stored in an offline environment.

title: Sensor Integration
description: Remote field sensors measuring temperature and moisture integrate directly into your iFormBuilder forms for accurate field conditions.
